title: Efficacy and safety of Tongxin formula in the treatment of coronary microvascular disease: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial study
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Feng-Qun Xie, Yi-Sheng Wang, Lei Zhang, Wen Zhu, Jie Cheng, Yun-Yan Lu, Shao-Hua Xu, Xian-Kai Li, Qi-Mao Feng
